statements.select: SELECT '' as "UserID", '' as "ProjectUID", "ProgId", "ProgName", "Remark", "ProgLevel", "AssemblyName", "ClassName", "MethodName", "ParentId", "SeqNo", "ProgType", "ProgModuleType","ProgIco" FROM Smmprog order by SeqNo

SELECT distinct t3.userid as "UserID", t2.projectuid as "ProjectUID", t1.progid as "ProgId", "ProgName", "Remark", "ProgLevel", "AssemblyName", "ClassName", "MethodName", "ParentId", "SeqNo", "ProgType", "ProgModuleType","ProgIco" FROM Smmprog t1,smdgroup t2,smugroup t3 where t1.progid=t2.progid and t2.groupno=t3.groupno and t2.run='1' and t2.projectuid=#ProjectUID# and t3.userid=#UserID# and t1.ParentId=#ParentId# and t1.ProgType='f' order by SeqNo

SELECT '' as "UserID", '' as "ProjectUID", "ProgId", "ProgName", "Remark", "ProgLevel", "AssemblyName", "ClassName", "MethodName", "ParentId", "SeqNo", "ProgType", "ProgModuleType","ProgIco" FROM Smmprog where ProgModuleType=#ProgModuleType# order by SeqNo

SELECT distinct '' as "UserID", '' as "ProjectUID", '' ProgId, '' ProgName, '' Remark, '' ProgLevel, '' AssemblyName, '' ClassName, '' MethodName, '' ParentId, 0 SeqNo, ProgType, '' ProgModuleType, ProgIco FROM Smmprog order by SeqNo

SELECT distinct '' as "UserID", '' as "ProjectUID", '' ProgId, '' ProgName, '' Remark, '' ProgLevel, '' AssemblyName, '' ClassName, '' MethodName, '' ParentId, 0 SeqNo, ProgType, '' ProgModuleType, ProgIco FROM Smmprog order by SeqNo

SELECT distinct '' as "UserID", '' as "ProjectUID", '' ProgId, '' ProgName, '' Remark, '' ProgLevel, '' AssemblyName, '' ClassName, '' MethodName, '' ParentId, 0 SeqNo, ProgType, '' ProgModuleType, ProgIco FROM Smmprog order by SeqNo

SELECT '' as "UserID", '' as "ProjectUID", "ProgId", "ProgName", "Remark", "ProgLevel", "AssemblyName", "ClassName", "MethodName", "ParentId", "SeqNo", "ProgType", "ProgModuleType", ProgIco FROM Smmprog WHERE ProgId = #ProgId# order by SeqNo
SELECT count(*) as nums FROM Smmprog WHERE parentid = #value#
SELECT count(*) as num1 FROM Smmprog WHERE Parentid = #ProgId#

SELECT t3.userid as "UserID", t2.projectuid as "ProjectUID", t1.ProgId as "ProgId", "ProgName", "Remark", "ProgLevel", "AssemblyName", "ClassName", "MethodName", "ParentId", "SeqNo", "ProgType", "ProgModuleType" FROM Smmprog t1,Smdgroup t2,Smugroup t3 where t1.progid=t2.progid and t2.groupno=t3.groupno and t3.userid=#UserId# and t2.run='1' order by t1.SeqNo
